front.title: DetNet Queue Encapsulation with MPLS Data Plane

abstract.t: This document specifies format and principals for the MPLS header which contains the queuing delay information, designed for use over a DetNet network with MPLS data plane. The guaranteed delay support enables forwarding and scheduling decisions for time-sensitive service running on DetNet transit nodes that operate within a constrained network domain. This document also specifies a representation for the delay field values in such networks.
